channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.title: [+2191] Guinea Pig Harem [pic]
item.description: A hero to all of us.

item.title: [+2023] White Women's Workout, a hilarious approach to exercise
item.description: Comedian, Godfrey, plays Fitness Guru, Ty Bowman. Combining racial stereotypes with exercise techniques, Ty has created Southern Cali's latest workout craze....

item.title: [+1996] Say Cheese! [Pic]
[+1759] Calvin and Hobbes: "AIEEE!! THEY GOT FRANK!!"...[pic]
[+1510] Bro's... Medieval Edition
[+1426] FCC hands Hollywood the keys to your Computer, TV and more
item.description: The FCC has given Hollywood permission to activate the "Selective Output Control" technologies in your set-top box. These are hidden flags that allow the MPAA to deactivate parts of your home theater depending on what you're watching. And it sucks.

item.title: [+1358] 15 Things You Didn't Know About Star Trek [INFOGRAPHIC]
[+1183] Om Nom Nom OOF!
[+1116] This guy's Parkour skills are insane
item.description: Jaws will drop, brix be shat. Damian Walters takes parkour to a new level.

item.title: [+990] Mother's Day FAIL [PIC]
[+964] Raid on MO family just one more reason to end 'War on Drugs'
item.description: Last February, a SWAT team raided a house in Columbia, Missouri, shooting 2 dogs (1 fatally) in the process. The found a misdemeanor's worth of marijuana. That, actually, is one of the BETTER outcomes of the "War on Drugs," and the "no-knock" raids by which that war is waged.

item.title: [+909] Putin Is A Professional Troll
item.description: This guy is a deviously smart asshole and somehow that makes me like him.

item.title: [+806] Stick It In a Muffin
[+780] 13 Components That Defined a Great Website... in 1998
item.description: The year is 1998. Everyone and their mom is planning their own website, and you’re looking to get in on the action. But, how? Easy, as any informed webmaster of our time knows, there are 13 critical components that define a great website. Allow me to explain…

item.title: [+741] Police Attack Video Causes Firestorm Of Controversy
item.description: A firestorm of controversy has erupted after KIRO-TV aired a video of Seattle officers hurling racial slurs while stomping on an innocent man. City leaders expressed shock and disappointment Friday at video that first aired showing two Seattle police officers kicking a man as he lay on the ground. item.description: In her most memorable sketch of the night, White appeared in an NPR-themed sketch about baked goods

item.title: [+574] Dude Accidentally Washes His Hands In Pee (Video)
item.description: And now it's all making sense to him. Yes, he just peed in the sink, and, yes, he just took a dump in a trashcan.

item.title: [+559] Sony Sued Again For Removing PS3 Linux Feature
item.description: A second class action lawsuit has been filed against Sony Computer Entertainment America for removing the 'Other OS' feature from the PlayStation 3.

item.title: [+541] Such Thoughtful Parents (PIC)
item.description: Be glad your mother probably isn't this evil. Happy Mother's Day!
